title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Collaborative Attitude Change Process for Human Trafficking Prevention: Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of human trafficking, no educational field experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the social impacts of human trafficking issues and develop a critical perspective.
In a collaborative learning community, learners engage in cognitive dissonance experiences for attitude change through peer discussions and feedback at least three times.
When designing human trafficking prevention education activities, learners can apply at least two social presence strategies to enhance learner engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
